about_the_game:
Get Order!



Welcome to Get Order! Where fun has never been this epic. This game brings together four friends in exciting adventures, featuring unique game modes. You and your friends will come together at critical moments to become a real team. Work together to complete incoming orders and build unforgettable memories. Get Order! guarantees entertainment like never before.

Game Modes:



• Computer Orders: Defy technology! Four friends come together to complete rapidly increasing computer orders. Understand the required components, communicate, and assemble them in time by collaborating with your team.


• Tasty Foods: Master the kitchen! Bring your team together by preparing food orders during busy restaurant hours. You'll need to work together to provide fast and accurate service. Who can serve more efficiently and faster?


• Mystery Task (Surprise Mode): The mystery of this mode awaits you! Are you ready to discover Get Order!'s biggest surprise? Guide your team on a secret mission and be prepared for unexpected surprises.

Get Order! offers the perfect blend of fun and teamwork. Join forces with your friends, overcome challenges, and create unforgettable memories. Get ready to be part of this action-packed and energetic adventure. Discover real fun with Get Order! To learn more about the game and enjoy it, purchase Get Order! on Steam now and embark on enchanting adventures with your friends!

name: Get Order! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 or AMD equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or AMD equivalent

short_description: Join your friends in unforgettable adventures with the fun cooperative game, Get Order!, supporting 1-4 players. Assemble computers, serve delicious meals, and get ready for new professional missions awaiting you!
